highlight_popover_api.name: `popover` attribute (Popover API)
highlight_popover_api.description: HTML syntax and JS API facilitating popovers such as overlays, popups, menus etc.
highlight_popover_api.descriptionHtml: HTML syntax and JS API facilitating popovers such as overlays, popups, menus etc.
highlight_popover_api.descriptionClean: HTML syntax and JS API facilitating popovers such as overlays, popups, menus etc.

example.code: Popover content
example.codeHighlighted: <button popovertarget="foo">Toggle the popover</button> <div id="foo" popover>Popover content</div>

resources.title: The Popover API (previously Popup) · Issue #743 · w3ctag/design-reviews · GitHub

webFeature.description_html: The popover HTML attribute creates an overlay to display content on top of other page content. Popovers can be shown declaratively using HTML, or using the showPopover() method.
webFeature.name: Popover
